input_text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to rip mp3s from spotify?
input_text.Response A: Sure, I can explain that in simple terms.  First, you need to install a third-party program.  Then you can just search for the song you want, and the program will download it for you.
input_text.Response B:
Sure, I can help you with that! To rip mp3s from Spotify, you can use a program called "Spotify Music Downloader" or "Spotify ripper." These programs will allow you to download and convert your Spotify music to mp3 format.

Once you have downloaded and installed one of these programs, you can open it and connect to your Spotify account. Then, you can search for the music you want to rip and select the songs you want to download. The program will then download and convert the music to mp3 format.

After the music has been downloaded and converted, you can find it in the program's "Downloaded" folder. You can then move the music to your computer's "Music" folder and play it on your music player.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

label_annotations.factors_a: I based my overall score for response A on the simplicity and level of detail that was included in the response which made it simple and easy to understand for people to learn how to rip mp3s from Spotify which is why I gave 3 for the rating of response A.
label_annotations.factors_b: I based on overall score for response B based on the programs that this person mentioned which didn't appear as downloadable programs with the same names when I tried doing a Google Search to find these programs to be able to download them. I could not find any specific programs named "Spotify ripper" or "Spotify Music Downloader" when I looked them up on Google search. I found a lot of similar named programs, but none of the programs that I could find on Google search were specifically named "Spotify ripper" or "Spotify Music Downloader" which is why I gave response B a low score of 2.
label_annotations.feedback: I did not experience any technical difficulties while taking this survey.
